dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S548 IS: To clarify that funding for the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board is not subject to the sequester.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Enzi (for himself and Mr. Murphy) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Budget

form.official-title: To clarify that funding for the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board is not subject to the sequester.

section.text: Section 251A of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (2 U.S.C. 901a) does not apply with respect to the funding of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board.
